meanings.definition: The belief or doctrine that Jesus Christ was adopted as the Son of God at his baptism or resurrection.
meanings.sent1: Some scholars study adoptianisms to understand different perspectives on Jesus' divine nature.
meanings.sent2: The debate over adoptianisms has been ongoing among theologians for centuries.
meanings.sent3: At the conference, the discussion on adoptianisms led to some lighthearted debates.
meanings.sent4: In the world of theology, adoptianisms is like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The concept of adoptianisms sheds light on the complexities of religious beliefs.
